enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve cleaning up expired entries from the map, which is a prerequisite for determining the size of the map.
The 'size' method relies on the current time to remove expired entries, similar to the 'now' method used in other parts of the class.
Both methods return a boolean value indicating the state of the map, which can be used to construct assertions for the 'size' method.
The 'size' method can be asserted by checking the presence of keys in the map, which is similar to the 'containsKey' method.
